None.Name: Infectious Vermin
None.Description: Infects up to 7 enemies within a 25m radius with a dreadful disease. If an infected unit dies within the next 20 seconds a Nightcrawler will spawn out of its corpse with Frenzy enabled. Reusable every 30 seconds.
